ygData.subject: Mudwater Rune no drop?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a RL lvl 35 Rogue friend who acquired a Mudwater Rune recently. He can t recall offline if it s No Drop. I figure it is, being a quest item, but thought
ygData.messageBody:
I have a RL lvl 35 Rogue friend who acquired a Mudwater Rune recently. He can't recall offline if it's No Drop. I figure it is, being a quest item, but thought I'd ask. He didn't reply when I asked him casually if he'd get an Opoline Helm for me, too. *g*

Thanks!

Operaman Overtone
Meandering Maestro, almost 22
<Spirit of the Moon>
Innoruuk

p.s. If I get it, that will make one component of every lambent piece. Already have Shin items, Griffene Charm, both Runes of the One Eye, and the breastplate. Didn't think I'd be nearly this far along yet, Harmonic not withstanding! So, if you're a young bard, what are you waiting for? Go for it!
